data.question: What is the molecular formula of BINAP-MOF?

What is the role of HBr in the post-synthetic metalation of 1 with Ru(cod)(2-methyl-allyl)2?
data.answer: It is used to afford 1•Ru after the addition of Ru(cod)(2-methyl-allyl)2.

What was the reaction condition for the post-synthetic metalation of 1 with [Rh(nbd)2](BF4)?
data.answer: The mixture was allowed to stand overnight after addition of [Rh(nbd)2](BF4) to 1.
